title: Apply for a driving licence
description: Use this form to apply for a driving licence in the UK. Fill in all required fields and provide accurate information. You must be a UK resident and over 17 years old.
explanation: I assumed that the user requires a driving licence application form for UK residents. I included fields for name, email, date of birth with a minimum age restriction of 17 years, preferred contact methods, and options for vehicle type (automatic or manual). I also added a text area for health problems to be explained. The form includes clear requirements for residency and age.
before_you_start: You must be a UK resident and over 17 years old to apply for a driving licence.
what_happens_next: We will review your application and contact you if we need more information.

questions.hint_text: Enter your full name as it appears on official documents
